title: not opening
body: i click the icon for league to start. it comes up with the words league of legends, then nothing happens. can someone tell me how to fix this?

replies.body: well i tried something over on the NA forums and nothing is happening now (same as before). plz can someone tell me how to fix it

Heres what you need to do:

-Close all other applications
-Reset your router
-Go into your League of Legends folder
-Throw your PC at the wall

League should open now.

Support ticket. 
This has happennd to me before and couldn't play for a few matches.
Could be internet connection.
Try using the launcher file; don't click on the desktop icon; actually go into the file and find the 'launcher' and open that. That could work.
I'm no expert but you should probably use the
